ygData.subject: Re: Plane of Air
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The *G*orgalask drops a bunch of different stuff i am pretty sure, on our server we got a trean tear (very nice druid earring) and a paladin belth with
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:05 PM 1/22/2000 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Dark" <jackal@...>
>
>Quests items don't dissapear. A warrior had some quest items and logged he
>came back and still had the items.
>
>Naeeldar
>

The *G*orgalask drops a bunch of different stuff i am pretty sure, on our
server we got a trean tear (very nice druid earring) and a paladin belth
with haste, etc. These are all very nice items and stand apart of any
quests. Now, there are also a bunch of crappy pieces of armour that are
part of quests. The usual rythmn so far appears to be 1 no drop item and
then 2 fairly common tradable quest components. We actually had enough to
finish a cleric quest, Courage, last night. But of course the quest didnt
work and we got jack. No thank you, no not enough, just nothing from the
quest giver. Very disappoiting.
